Description.Text:
Right in the heart of Singapore's Bras Basah-Bugis Arts, Culture, Learning and Entertainment hub, Citadines Mount Sophia Singapore is the ideal choice for independent travelers, the creative services community and academic professionals alike.
Part of an integrated lifestyle development, the apart'hotel is a short walk to Orchard Road and Dhoby Ghaut station and offers excellent access to the Central Business District. Close by is Prinsep Street, a prime food and beverage and entertainment zone with a melange of restaurants, cafes and pubs.
With a chic living space doubling up as a home office with broadband access, a fully-equipped kitchen and separate living room. To recharge, hit the Fitness Corner or relax at the Residents' Lounge.
The serviced residence offers Airport transfer, Baby sitting service, Disabled facilities, Dry cleaning, Gym/Fitness facilities, Internet access High-Speed, Internet access Wireless, Laundry service, Lift/Elevator, Lobby, Non-smoking rooms, Parking facilities at cost, Reception, Safe deposit box, Residence Lounge and Business Centre Services.
* Minimum stay of 7 nights

It is a short walk to Orchard Road and Dhoby Ghaut station and offers excellent access to the Central Business District. Close by is Prinsep Street, a prime food and beverage and entertainment zone with a melange of restaurants, cafes and pubs.

1 Bedroom Deluxe - This room offers one queen bed along with Air conditioning, Bathroom amenities, Cable/Satellite TV, CD player, Crockery/Cutlery, DVD player, Ensuite/Private bathroom, Color TV, Iron/Ironing board, Hairdryer, Kettle, Full Kitchen, Microwave oven, Modem/data port connection, Non-smoking rooms, Refrigerator, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone and Voicemail. Daily housekeeping.
Studio - This room offers one queen bed along with Air conditioning, Bathroom amenities, Cable/Satellite TV, CD player, Crockery/Cutlery, DVD player, Ensuite/Private bathroom, Color TV, Iron/Ironing board, Hairdryer, Kettle, Full Kitchen, Microwave oven, Modem/data port connection, Non-smoking rooms, Refrigerator, Safe in room, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone and Voicemail. Daily housekeeping.
